import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
source.8ae11d3d:
rows,cols=df.shape
print(f'There are {rows} Rows and {cols} Columns')
source.6378a68d:
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
X=df.drop(columns={'Class'})
y=df['Class']
X_train,X_test,y_train,y_test = train_test_split(X,y,test_size=0.2)
source.3b42300f:
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler
sc=StandardScaler()
X_train=sc.fit_transform(X_train)
X_test=sc.fit_transform(X_test)
source.20180f54:
from sklearn.linear_model import LogisticRegression
LR=LogisticRegression()
LR.fit(X_train,y_train)
y_pred=LR.predict(X_test)
source.cdf565b7:
from sklearn.metrics import confusion_matrix
cm= confusion_matrix(y_test,y_pred)
sns.heatmap(cm,annot=True)
source.bcf2525c:
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
print('logistic regression accuracy :',accuracy_score(y_test,y_pred))
source.7b71eba1:
from sklearn.naive_bayes import GaussianNB
NB=GaussianNB()
NB.fit(X_train,y_train)
y_pred2=NB.predict(X_test)
##################################
cm2=confusion_matrix(y_test,y_pred2)
sns.heatmap(cm2,annot=True)
################################
print('Naive byes accuracy :',accuracy_score(y_test,y_pred2))
source.85c0c923:
from sklearn.tree import DecisionTreeClassifier
tree= DecisionTreeClassifier()
tree.fit(X_train,y_train)
y_pred3=tree.predict(X_test)

cm3=confusion_matrix(y_test,y_pred3)
sns.heatmap(cm3,annot=True)

print('Decission Tree accuracy :',accuracy_score(y_test,y_pred3))
source.686ae189:
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
RF= RandomForestClassifier()
RF.fit(X_train,y_train)
y_pred4=RF.predict(X_test)

cm4=confusion_matrix(y_test,y_pred4)
sns.heatmap(cm4,annot=True)

print('Random Forest accuracy :',accuracy_score(y_test,y_pred4))
